p: The acidic soil reaction, a lower supply of humus, total nitrogen, mobile potassium, calcium, and magnesium against the background of a sufficiently high content of mobile phosphorus and sodium in the soil led to a lower content of total phenols and a lower content of extractives in the raw material of oregano. The flavonoid content in tested plants is significantly positively affected by soil mobile phosphorus, mobile potassium, magnesium, and significantly negatively affected by soil sodium.
